snippet.title: The Gap - Official Trailer | The MIX Showcase October 2023
snippet.description: Here's another look at The Gap in this latest trailer for the upcoming psychological thriller game. In The Gap, driven by the rare illness plaguing his family, Joshua has to face the innermost depths of his past--moments both beautiful and painful. Exploring parallel realities through déjà vu seems to be the only way he can recover his memories and salvage his life. The Gap will be available on PC, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, and Xbox One on October 19, 2023.
